mapper.select: SELECT car_number FROM car_sell_board WHERE car_number = #{car_number}

SELECT A.selliboard, A.writeriuser, A.category, A.manufacturer, A.model, A.detail_model , A.price, A.color, A.fuel, A.distan_driven, A.gearbox, A.trading_area, A.car_number , B.mainimg FROM car_sell_board A LEFT JOIN car_image B ON A.selliboard = B.selliboard where A.category = #{category} and (A.model LIKE concat('%',#{searchVal},'%') or A.detail_model LIKE concat('%',#{searchVal},'%') or A.manufacturer LIKE concat('%',#{searchVal},'%'))
ORDER BY A.likesum desc
ORDER BY A.price desc
ORDER BY A.price
ORDER BY A.selliboard desc
LIMIT ${startIdx}, ${recordCount}

SELECT A.selliboard, A.writeriuser, A.category, A.manufacturer, A.model, A.detail_model , A.price, A.color, A.fuel, A.distan_driven, A.gearbox, A.trading_area, A.car_number , B.mainimg,C.aircon,C.smart_key,C.camera,C.hi_pass,C.navigation,C.bluetooth, D.car_state,D.accident_state,D.manage_state,D.inout_inform,D.tuning_inform,D.other, E.nm as writerNm, E.iuser FROM car_sell_board A INNER JOIN car_image B ON A.selliboard = B.selliboard INNER JOIN car_option C ON A.selliboard = C.selliboard INNER JOIN car_explanation D ON A.selliboard = D.selliboard INNER JOIN t_user E ON A.writeriuser = E.iuser WHERE A.selliboard = ${selliboard};

SELECT ceil(COUNT(selliboard) / ${recordCount}) AS result FROM car_sell_board where model LIKE concat('%',#{searchVal},'%') or detail_model LIKE concat('%',#{searchVal},'%') or manufacturer LIKE concat('%',#{searchVal},'%')
SELECT A.selliboard, A.model, A.likesum, B.mainimg FROM car_sell_board A LEFT JOIN car_image B ON A.selliboard = B.selliboard ORDER BY likesum desc LIMIT 9
SELECT A.selliboard, A.model, A.hits, B.mainimg FROM car_sell_board A LEFT JOIN car_image B ON A.selliboard = B.selliboard ORDER BY hits desc LIMIT 9
